stdDivProperties.name: Human
stdDivProperties.heading: Normal Human Being
stdDivProperties.description: Has no additional power or side-effect

stdDivProperties.name: Apollo
stdDivProperties.heading: God of Music
stdDivProperties.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

stdDivProperties.name: Artemis
stdDivProperties.heading: Goddess of the Hunt
stdDivProperties.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

stdDivProperties.name: Athena
stdDivProperties.heading: Goddess of Wisdom
stdDivProperties.description: Opponent’s Turn: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

stdDivProperties.name: Atlas
stdDivProperties.heading: Titan Shouldering the Heavens
stdDivProperties.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

stdDivProperties.name: Demeter
stdDivProperties.heading: Goddess of the Harvest
stdDivProperties.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

stdDivProperties.name: Hephaestus
stdDivProperties.heading: God of Blacksmiths
stdDivProperties.description: Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

stdDivProperties.name: Minotaur
stdDivProperties.heading: Bull-headed Monster
stdDivProperties.description: Your Move: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

stdDivProperties.name: Pan
stdDivProperties.heading: God of the Wild
stdDivProperties.description: Win Condition: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

stdDivProperties.name: Prometheus
stdDivProperties.heading: Titan Benefactor of Mankind
stdDivProperties.description: Your Turn: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
